Detailed Description

VPS - Configuration for size of static object array.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define VPS_CFG_MEM_DSS_MAX_WB_PIPE_OBJS   (1U)

DSS number of instances for Vid + Gfx (Forward) pipe objects to allocate. If user uses only fewer than these pipes, this can be reduced!!

DSS number of instances of WB pipe objects to allocate Tda2xx and Tda3xx supports 1 WB pipeline

#define VPS_CFG_MEM_VIP_MAX_INST_OBJS   (VPS_VIP_MAX)

Number of VIP instances objects to allocate.

Note: This macro is used for storing platform data at init time. Hence this should be changed only when a particular VIP instance is removed from the build using make macros like VPS_VIP1_BUILD etc...

#define VPS_CFG_MEM_VIP_MAX_PORT_OBJS
Value:
(VPS_CFG_MEM_VIP_MAX_INST_OBJS * VPS_VIP_SLICE_MAX * \
VPS_VIP_PORT_MAX)
VPS_CFG_MEM_VIP_MAX_INST_OBJS
#define VPS_CFG_MEM_VIP_MAX_INST_OBJS
Number of VIP instances objects to allocate.
Definition: vps_cfgMem.h:113
VPS_VIP_SLICE_MAX
#define VPS_VIP_SLICE_MAX
Maximum number of slice per VIP.
Definition: vps_captureVipDataTypes.h:91
VPS_VIP_PORT_MAX
#define VPS_VIP_PORT_MAX
Maximum number of port per slice.
Definition: vps_captureVipDataTypes.h:98

Number of VIP port objects to allocate. If user uses only fewer than these ports, this can be reduced!! Note: Each VIP instance has 4 ports. That's why it is (x * 2 * 2) below.
